thread.title: Lotte New York Palace
thread.title_full: Lotte New York Palace - Review of The Towers at Lotte New York Palace, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MMSTraveler
title: Lotte New York Palace
text: We have stayed here several times and this was the first time we stayed in the Towers. We have always had great stays but the Towers were even better. Clara Law helped us with something we needed and that type of service you can't get just anywhere. Thank you Clara and NY Palace! Great location, great rooms, great staff!
